ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I use the Cabilis Pot.  You do not lose invis when potting, and the zone in point is right next to the zone line to Lake of Ill Omen.  I have had no trouble
ygData.messageBody:
I use the Cabilis Pot. You do not lose invis when potting, and the zone in
point is right next to the zone line to Lake of Ill Omen. I have had no
trouble using SSoT to zip by the newbie guards on the way out. The only
possible danger would be if the guards were trained to both sides of the
zone line.

It is even better for my human monk, as his faction is great in Cabilis (can
bank/bind/train there). But the swim is very looooong for him :)

Rokenn

>
> Gilgurth
> Charming Fool of 28 Winces
> E'ci

>
